name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 20, Hong Kong. A citizen waved the Palestinian flag on the street. The sign on the flag read "Stop the massacre of Palestinian civilians"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: The man in the video is named Li Dafu (online name). He has now returned to China, and the "Warden" is still on the front line.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Zhihu netizen shared his experience of donating and using blood.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 18, the Chinese Consulate General in Myanmar was attacked by a grenade. The incident caused minor damage to the building and no one was injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shenzhen Japanese School has now resumed classes. Security measures at the school gate are very strict, with police patrolling with shields and police dogs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 20, Shaanxi. A parent posted on Xiaohongshu that he took his daughter to eat Japanese food. When ordering food, his daughter suddenly said: I want to destroy them! When asked what she wanted to destroy, she just kept repeating "I want to destroy them". During the meal, the daughter only ate the lemon and did not eat other dishes. The parent also said that his daughter is not very good at speaking but loves to listen to the national anthem and even listens to it before going to bed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 20, Red Star News reported that "Sinwar's wife carried luxury bags worth about $32,000 into the tunnel," which caused dissatisfaction and resistance from many netizens. Netizens questioned whether Red Star News had received money from Jewish consortiums to discredit Sinwar. Currently, Red Star News has deleted the report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on October 19, Republican presidential candidate Trump recently said that if China "enters" Taiwan, additional tariffs of 150% to 200% will be imposed on China. On the question of whether he would send troops to defend Taiwan, Trump did not give a direct answer, but only said that Xi Jinping respected him, so he would not go to that step.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Breaking news! On the afternoon of October 21, several flights from Wuxi, Dalian, Beijing and other places to Fuzhou Changle International Airport circled in the air and made emergency landings at nearby Wenzhou Airport and Xiamen Airport. The delay rate at Fuzhou Airport reached 100%. The airport customer service responded: Temporary air traffic control.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Hong Kong internet celebrity posted a video saying that they were puzzled by the fact that mainland tourists always like to do the "Asian squat", so they pushed a wheelchair and asked the mainland tourists squatting on the roadside: I see you squatting for a long time, do you have a problem with your lumbar spine, do you want to sit in a wheelchair? At the end of the video, the internet celebrities said: It turns out that there is no problem with your lumbar spine, then stand up quickly and find a seat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 21, lawyer Zhang Qingfang said he had received a penalty notice from the Beijing Judicial Bureau revoking his lawyer's license. He said, "I no longer have any entanglements or nostalgia. I have done my best for the rule of law in this era."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on October 20, Japanese journalists exclusively obtained Russian documents about North Korean soldiers from Ukrainian intelligence agencies: a military uniform size questionnaire distributed by the Russian army to North Korean soldiers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 21, the media "one studio" interviewed several couples who divorced due to falling house prices. Falling house prices are very hurtful, and the conflicts between couples are even more devastating. Husband and wife are birds of the same forest, but they run away when house prices fall. The first batch of couples whose house prices fell have entered the divorce cooling-off period. Currently, the Weibo topic #首首房屋落的夫妻已缔了# has been banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 20, Shandong. A ragged old man picks food from a trash bin. The poster of the core socialist values behind him reads "The people have faith, the nation has hope, and the country has strength."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 20 (Released) A Chinese mercenary said that he and his comrades waited for five days before they received the meager supplies. In addition, there was a severe water shortage in the area. "We only drank a sip of water a day. How can we eat these foods without water? Can we chew dry coffee?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 20, Hebei. An old man in tattered military uniform was picking up newspapers on the roadside. He said he was 94 years old and had participated in the Liberation War in his early years. He also had to take care of his mentally handicapped son at home. A kind man bought some food for the old man.
